name: rexbidvALT
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))

|- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))

comment: Alternate proof of ~ rexbidv , shorter but requires more axioms. (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-1994.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
